structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Construction subdistrict not to include nonconsenting cities or districts.
law.text: The construction subdistrict shall not include the whole or any part of any incorporated city with a population equal to or greater than three thousand (3,000) based upon the most recent federal decennial census, or any sanitation district or sewer construction district, or that part of a water district in which the water district has exercised its power to establish sanitary sewerage facilities pursuant to KRS 74.407 to 74.415, except with the consent of the legislative or managing board of such city or district. With such consent, the property owners of such city or district will be considered as freeholders of the construction subdistrict.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 58, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 15, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 6. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 33, sec. 13.
